Short Biography

I have great interest in the field of software development. Good and growing theoretical knowledge, necessary skills, and also great potential to develop over time and become a quality software developer. My motivation is my desire, my passion, which is paving my path before me. It keeps me driven and helps me to focus my life in the field of software development and am ready to actively develop in that direction throughout my life. While studying at the IT Academy, I had the opportunity to develop my technical skills needed to work in this profession. Working on different projects during my studies allowed me to learn from mistakes and made me sure I won't give in to errors but rather grow a bit taller because of them.
